title: Tipping the Scales of Justice
description: Marika says her husband Joe's habit of tipping housekeeping and service workers with coins is rude and contrary to the spirit of the gesture. Joe says, as long as he's tipping, what's the problem?
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
